title: Apartments That Approve Broken Lease, Bad Credit, Past Foreclosure
posting_body: Exterior Amenities: Fitness center, Pool, Business center, Perimeter fence, Door to door trash pickup, Picnic area, Outdoor Grills, School bus stop, Play ground, W/D rental($50/mo), Volleyball, Handicap modified units, Bus stop

Interior Amenities: W/D connections, Walk-in closets, Cable ready, Hi-speed internet, Non-carpeted flooring, Ice makers, Dishwashers, Garbage disposals, Ceiling fans, Miniblinds, Microwaves, Frost free refrigerators
Locations all over Dallas, Fort Worth and surrounding areas!
Criminal Background - Misdemeanors or Felonies Considered!
My service is FREE to you!
Must make 3x the rent in income
Lauren Smith - Real estate agent with Texas Apartment Experts
